name: blanket for martin
notes:
a new baby blanket is in my pattern collection, namely friends of mine will have baby in may 2022. 

it's a fully reversible pattern that i recommend for beginner knitters too, you have to know just the following techniques:

* cast on
* knit
* purls
* bind off

if you like the pattern and you would like to read more from me, follow the facebook and instagram page of the blog.

www.facebook.com/purlsbypalma

www.instagram.com/purlsbypalma
